Lyric:
[by:哈施泰格费事]

[00:41.95]I'm traveling light
[00:43.34]
[00:44.63]It's au revoir
[00:45.62]
[00:47.14]My once so bright my fallen star
[00:51.16]
[00:52.53]I'm running late they'll close the bar
[00:56.29]
[00:57.70]I used to play one mean guitar
[01:01.81]I guess I'm just somebody who
[01:06.42]
[01:08.21]Has given up on the me and you
[01:11.82]
[01:13.54]I'm not alone I've met a few
[01:17.19]
[01:19.00]Traveling light like we used to do
[01:22.54]
[01:34.72]Good night good night my fallen star
[01:38.56]
[01:40.08]I guess you're right you always are
[01:43.83]
[01:45.11]I know you're right about the blues
[01:48.82]
[01:50.49]You live some life you'd never choose
[01:54.85]I'm just a fool a dreamer who forgot to dream of the me and you
[02:04.48]
[02:06.25]I'm not alone I've met a few
[02:09.92]
[02:11.79]Traveling light like we used to do
[02:15.60]
[02:38.22]Traveling light
[02:39.47]
[02:40.60]It's au revoir
[02:41.71]
[02:43.19]My once so bright my fallen star
[02:47.12]
[02:48.52]I'm running late they'll close the bar
[02:52.47]
[02:53.94]I used to play one mean guitar
[02:57.86]I guess I'm just somebody who
[03:02.71]
[03:04.42]Has given up on the me and you
[03:08.09]
[03:09.64]I'm not alone I've met a few
[03:13.04]
[03:15.12]Traveling light like we used to do
[03:18.62]
[03:20.21]But if the road leads back to you
[03:24.23]
[03:25.48]Must I forget the things I knew
[03:29.43]
[03:30.83]When I was friends with one or two
[03:34.47]
[03:36.43]Traveling light like we used to
[03:39.69]
[03:40.30]I'm traveling light
